howWeWork.title: How we work
howWeWork.subtitle: We’ll start on your task within 3 days

about.title: About us
about.tagline: Fewer words — more cases. Results speak best

partners.title: We're not an agency. We're partners.
partners.subtitle: 🧠 We think like a business
partners.description: We don't just do tasks. We propose solutions that drive results. We know ROI, MVP, and when not to over-engineer.

fastStart.title: We code fast, not sloppy
fastStart.subtitle: 🚀 Fast start
fastStart.description: We get to work within 3 days after the first call. No long briefs, no delays, no fluff.

plainSpeech.title: We speak plainly
plainSpeech.subtitle: 💬 No tech poetry
plainSpeech.description: We explain in human terms what, how and why we do things. Always reachable, fully transparent.

rightTools.title: We choose what works
rightTools.subtitle: 🎯 Tech for the task
rightTools.description: We don't push complex solutions when simple ones work. We propose what fits your project.

subtitle.p1: The form is simple. The process is even simpler.

servicesPage.title: Services that work
servicesPage.tagline: Minimum “we can do everything.” Maximum—what your business actually needs.

web.title: Websites
web.subtitle: Fast, responsive, clear. We build sites that don’t just “hang on the internet”, but lead the customer to action. For any business.

popup.title: Website development
popup.intro: 💬 Better a website than yet another Instagram account.
popup.description: We build websites that don’t just “exist”. They sell, explain and guide. Landing pages, corporate sites, stores, microsites—end to end.
popup.finalNote: 💡 A website is your digital storefront. Let it work for you.

mobile.title: Mobile apps
mobile.subtitle: iOS or Android—we create apps that look great and work great. With push notifications, payments, user accounts—everything your service needs.

popup.title: Mobile app development
popup.intro: 💬 Your service in the customer’s pocket.
popup.description: We build mobile apps people don’t delete after two days. iOS, Android, cross-platform—with maximum attention to UX.

features.4: 🧪 Testing, deploy to App Store / Google Play

popup.finalNote: 💡 You can also ship an MVP as a mobile app—faster, cheaper, more mobile.

bots.title: Telegram bots
bots.subtitle: Bots that automate: take orders, book services, reply 24/7. Faster than an app. Cheaper than a web service. Closer to the client.

popup.title: Telegram bots
popup.intro: 💬 Everything you do manually—a bot will do automatically.
popup.description: We build bots that take orders, register users, answer questions and forget no one.

features.2: 🔌 Integrations with CRM, Google Sheets, payments
features.4: 🌐 Integration with your site or Instagram

popup.finalNote: 💡 Telegram is faster than a site, cheaper than an app, and closer to the user.

mvp.title: MVP projects
mvp.subtitle: Your idea as a real product in 10–15 days. Fast launch, minimum features, maximum sense. Perfect for validating hypotheses.

popup.title: Build an MVP
popup.description: We help quickly and efficiently check whether people need your idea. An MVP is the first working version—no extra code, real value.

features.2: 🛠️ Development (site, bot or app—whichever is faster)

popup.finalNote: 💡 Don’t write a 30-page spec. Write to us.

outstaff.title: Outstaffing
outstaff.subtitle: Flexible, fast, no extra moves. We don’t just add people—we embed into your process and strengthen the team. For any project and stack.

popup.title: Outstaffing
popup.intro: 💬 Don’t hire a team. Hire results.
popup.description: We take over the entire tech part: from a single developer to a full project team. Back-end, front-end, QA, DevOps—without the pain of hiring, onboarding and micromanagement.

features.1: 🛠️ We’ll match a developer or a team to the task
features.2: 🌼 We integrate into your process or build it from scratch
features.3: 🛠️ We work via Jira / Trello / Notion—whatever suits you
features.5: 📗 NDA, stability and clean code guaranteed

popup.finalNote: 💡 Your team grows—without HR, extra desks or offices.

learnup.task: MVP to test the hypothesis — online English courses

deliverables.1: Simple website with a course catalog
deliverables.2: Sign-up, payments, timers, and student dashboard

learnup.results: MVP in 12 days, first 100 users in a week

lushglow.task: Build a fast e-commerce site with a minimalist design

deliverables.1: UX/UI design focused on mobile experience

lushglow.results: +53% online sales in the first 3 weeks

docgo.task: Digitize appointment and data storage processes

deliverables.1: Web and mobile app for patients
deliverables.2: Doctor scheduling integration and online payments

docgo.results: −42% front desk workload, +70% of patients choose online booking

contactPopup.title: Write to us — and we’ll jump in!

subtitle.p1: We respond fast. No spam. No canned replies.
subtitle.p2: Fill out a short form — we’ll explain everything in plain language.

intro.p1: Launch in 3 days without building from scratch. Rent a ready-made site with design, logic and support included.
intro.p2: 👀 Pick a template, ⚙️ we set it up, 🚀 go live.

lokal.title: Template: LOKAL
lokal.desc: coffee shops, barbers, salons, small businesses

basic.title: Basic
basic.desc: For when you just need a website — nothing extra.

standard.title: Standard
standard.desc: The sweet spot for a business that needs to look alive.

flex.title: Flex
flex.desc: Adapts to you — like a good barista to your morning.

basic.desc: Minimal hassle — maximum peace of mind for a year.

standard.desc: Everything you need — plus a little extra.

features.4: 1 redesign or content refresh during the year

flex.desc: For those who want to live with their site.

lokal.who: Local businesses: barbershops, cafés, beauty salons, yoga studios. Look like a brand—without the brand-studio price.

includes.3: Telegram button or online booking (your choice)
includes.4: Gallery + short description for each service

lokal.style: Light, big photos, simple fonts. Atmosphere first.
lokal.feature: “Book” opens Telegram or a form in one click—no boring calendars.

results.1: We swap content — your site is ready
results.3: We’ll set up hosting or hand it over

mvp-one.who: Startups, agencies, consulting—anyone who wants to validate a hypothesis without burning out at the “let’s add more…” stage.
mvp-one.feature: After submit we show “What’s next” — like a chatbot guiding the flow.

results.2: Hosting setup or export to your platform
results.3: Everything works — you test the idea

menu.who: Restaurants, delivery, dark kitchens, street-food brands. If you cook — we’ll make it look delicious.

includes.5: “Deals of the week” section or homepage banner

menu.style: Rich colors, large photos, subtle animation. Mobile-friendly—even for a hungry iPhone 6 user.
menu.feature: Optional countdown: “offer ends in…” or “Only 3 pizzas left with discount”.

results.2: We’ll connect Telegram or keep a contact form
